org.ponyman.ca.business

Class CaServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ponyman.ca.business.CaServiceImpl

  • public class CaServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of cellular automata business logic and inner workings.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ponyman

      • getCaData

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getCaData(int _N,
                                                   int _rule)
        Function assembling and executing all steps of simulation.
        Parameters:
        _N - Size of the automata.
        _rule - Rule of the automata.

      • setRule

        private void setRule(int _r)
        Transforming decimal rule to binary array used in transformations.
        Parameters:
        _r - Rule in decimal representation.

      • applyTheRule

        private int applyTheRule(int p,
                         int q,
                         int r)
        Transformation method.

        Determines state of the cell in next step, using automat rule and states of the cell with its neighbours..

        Parameters:
        p - State of left hand-side neighbour cell.
        q - State of the cell in question.
        r - State of right hand-side neighbour cell.
        Returns:
        State of cell in next step.

      • walkTheStrip

        private void walkTheStrip()
        Method performing single step of simulation on whole automata.
